teams.name: KivaFriends.org
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse group of people with diverse reasons for participating on Kiva.org, but with a unifying desire to alleviate poverty around the world through making microloans to the hard working poor.
teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: Vermont... Jeezum Crow!
teams.loan_because: From the Green Mountains to the rest of the globe, we all benefit when collectively we can contribute to improve the lives of others.

teams.name: Presbyterian Kiva
teams.loan_because: We can.
teams.description: Group of committed Presbyterians who believe that Kiva is a good way to help people.

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because: "A man filled with the love of God is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race." ~ Joseph Smith
teams.description: Members and friends of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who are also Kiva lenders.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.
teams.description:
From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia. 
( Photo Copyright 2007 D L Ennis all rights reserved http://dlennis.wordpress.com )

teams.name: Denmark
teams.loan_because:
All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights. They are endowed with reason and conscience and should act towards one another in a spirit of brotherhood. 
(Article 1  of United Nations Declaration of Human Rights)
teams.description:
Team for everyone in Denmark, who are taking part of this great opportunity to improve the world one step at a time.

Use this to recruite friends. http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Location: HeartMath Denmark
Street: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 floor , 1202 Copenhagen K

More Info:: Facebook-group: Kiva Denmark  link: http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Gruppen her er for alle i Danmark, der støtter denne fantastiske ide om at hjælpe verden ét skridt af gangen.

Vil du hjælpe: Inviter venner - fortæl om Kiva 
http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Kiva Denmark holder møder om hvad vi kan gøre for at udbrede kendskabet til denne unikke måde at hjælpe på. Kontakt: Kristine.flagstad@uni-c.dk hvis du har nogen ideer eller skriv en meddelelse her til gruppen.

Næste møde holdes hos: HeartMath Danmark
Adresse: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 sal, 1202 Copenhagen K
Dato: Ikke fastlagt pt. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Se evt. mere på facebook gruppen : http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

teams.name: Holy Names University
teams.loan_because:
We are dedicated to the following: 
Dedication to Women and Children
Dedication to Justice
Service to People who are Poor or Marginalize
teams.description: Holy Names University, an academic community committed to the full development of each student, offers a liberal education rooted in the Catholic tradition, empowering a diverse student body for leadership and service in a diverse world.

teams.name: The Chalupiak Project
teams.loan_because: To help people who want to help themselves.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster

teams.name: Auburn University
teams.loan_because: These loans allow people who have limited access to capital, to invest in their futures and improve their lives.  It's the right thing to do.

teams.name: Furman University
teams.description: Open to Furman University students and alumni.

teams.name: Hemp Out
teams.loan_because: It’s in our nature, and it’s the right thing to do.
teams.description: We’re a kind group of lenders opposed to marijuana prohibition in the United States.  We feel pot should be decriminalized, taxed, and regulated much the same way alcohol is.  It’s our goal to recruit 420 members that aren’t afraid of a little weed in order to form a community of open-minded lenders that would like to “hemp out”.      Please visit www.norml.org to learn more about cannabis legalization. There’s nothing wrong with ganja; legalize bud!

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: Charles Roberts Jr. Memorial
teams.loan_because:
To honor the memory of a wonderful husband, dad, brother, uncle, grandfather and friend, Charles Roberts Jr., who died on August 21, 2010 shortly after being diagnosed with a cancerous brain tumor. Charlie's gift to his family and the world was his caring nature, kindness for all, concern for children, generosity of spirit, sense of humor, great smile and the personal warmth that he shared so freely with all those who were fortunate enough to have come into contact with him during his lifetime.

By helping others in this way Charlie's love, warmth, kindness and concern for kids will live on and we will be able to keep his legacy of love and concern for children alive and moving forward.
teams.description: We are a group of people who want to honor the memory of Charles Roberts Jr., by finding ways of helping others so that children across  the globe have access to basic necessities such as food, clothing, clean water, education, medical care and a chance to fufill  their dreams and improve their lives. We work together to accomplish this goal through the Kiva loans that we make in his honor.

teams.name: LDS
teams.loan_because: “He helps others most, who shows them how to help themselves.” A. P. Gouthey
teams.description: As members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, we are Christians and worship Jesus Christ as the Son of God, our Heavenly Father, the Saviour of the world who was born of Mary some 2,000 years ago in Bethlehem. Jesus, through His death and resurrection, is ''the way, the truth and the life'', providing all mankind the ultimate opportunity for salvation and eternal life with our Heavenly Father and His Son.

teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Warp and Weft, Weavers Worldwide
teams.loan_because: Weaving is a productive and empowering activity
teams.description: We  support weavers and fiber artists through out the world.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Heartland Oklahoma Team
teams.loan_because: Oklahomans are always willing to lend a hand to our neighbors as well as to total strangers.
teams.description: An active team of Oklahomans joining together to fund loans, work toward goals, and have fun with Kiva loan challenges.

teams.name: Kiva Kiwis
teams.loan_because: Because Kiwis know what it is to pull yourself  up by your bootstraps.
teams.description: Started in Oamaru New Zealand by a group of friends wanting to encourage and to make it easy for Kiwis to make loans through Kiva.

teams.name: Marie Forleo's Kiva Lending Team
teams.whereabouts: Global Baby!  HQ in NYC & LA
teams.loan_because: We're uber passionate about making a difference.  Nothing makes us more excited than using our skills and resources to increase prosperity, aliveness and well-being on the planet.
teams.description: We're a global group of creators committed to doing our best work, giving back and having a GREAT time while we do it!  Wanna join us? Requirements:  a can-do-attitude, sense of humor, a passion for possibility, and burning desire to use your creativity to be of service!

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Quarter to Three
teams.loan_because: We do what we must because we can.
teams.description: A collection of folks that hang around the same virtual water cooler.

teams.name: Orthodox Christian Kiva
teams.loan_because: All men and women are made in the image and after the likeness of God.
teams.description: We're the clergy, monastics, laypeople, catechumens and friends of the Eastern Orthodox Christian Church, a church whose history can be traced in unbroken continuity all the way back to Christ and His twelve apostles.

teams.name: Team Alaska
teams.description: Peoples from Alaska who want to help their fellow men and women around the world.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: KivaFriends - Agriculture Loans
teams.loan_because: we want to reduce world hunger.  This includes loans for farming, livestock, poultry, and the like.
teams.description: Our group makes loans to people that create more food for those in the world.  Many of these entrepreneurs are farmers that often request loans to help them with their crops.  Many times these loans are for a longer repayment period.

teams.name: Pakistan
teams.whereabouts: Pakistanis and friends of Pakistan worldwide!
teams.loan_because: We wish to encourage and support ambitious hard-working people all over Pakistan, in a dignified and empowering manner.
teams.description:
"If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion." - Dalai Lama

We are a group of generous, warm and benevolent individuals from all over the world, tackling poverty in Pakistan one loan at a time.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Be a Better Bank
teams.loan_because: Our goal is to create micro-financing opportunities to people in need- specifically in Ukraine. We believe in volunteerism and in supporting local entrepreneurs to a difference in their own lives and strengthen their community. We are working to create a network that can leverage resources and help Peace Corps Volunteers make even more of a difference in Ukraine.
teams.description: We are Peace Corps Volunteers who currently or previously served in Ukraine, as well as like minded family and friends. We loan to Ukrainian entrepreneurs to broaden our scope in developing individual skills and developing communities across the country.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Bloggers
teams.loan_because:
bloggers and their readers are generous people too. You don't have to run a blog to join the group. If you do run a blog, invite your readers/fans to join the group!

Just like blogs, our  money and support have no boundaries either.
teams.description: This group was created to bring together all types of Bloggers and their readers&fans who lend on Kiva.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Better Acupuncture
teams.loan_because: The small things make a difference.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Kiva Team Italia - Italy
teams.loan_because:
"Migliorare la vita degli altri migliora anche la tua" ....   .....  ...........
Improving lives of others also improves yours
teams.description:
Una bella fotografia della nostra splendida realtà… Bellissima, variegata, colorata, vivace… unica…. Italiana!!!!

--------------------------------

A beautiful picture of our wonderful reality… Beautiful, varied, colorful, lively.... unique……. Italian!

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Sterling Divas
teams.loan_because: We believe that women around the world should have the opportunity to own their own business. We believe in the power of the entrepreneurial  spirit and want to do our part to encourage success in business ventures in the Third World. As successful businesswomen, we want to do our part to contribute to businesswomen around the world.
teams.description: We are Independent Silpada Designs representatives (and our friends and family) who work very hard to be our own bosses. We operate our businesses out of our homes and we understand the ups and downs of being "business owners".
